More re-working in lede, some other touch-up

/* Biography */ Raymond Maine years with footnote
New source; added info on Mrs. Hawthorne

/* Later years */ Source for Pierce bio
/* Middle years */ Some touch-up; could not confirm March 15 pub date of Scarlet Letter
/* Biography */ More info and ref for Boston appointment
/* Biography */ Trying to put this in chrono order
/* Marriage */ More on customs house and after
